sentences.sContent: a modular course in business studies
sentences.sCn: 商学专业的一个单元课程

sentences.sContent: Most colleges now use the modular system of teaching.
sentences.sCn: 大多数大学现在都使用模块化的教学体系。

phrases.pCn: 模块化系统；积木式系统

trans.tranCn: 模块化的；模数的；有标准组件的
trans.tranOther: consisting of separate parts or units which can be put together to form something, often in different combinations
